# tabViewType

**Instance Property**

The tab type to display the tabs.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tabViewType: NSTabView.TabType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The supported values for this property are listed in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTabView/TabType]. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTabView/TabType/topTabsBezelBorder].

## Configuring the Tab Attributes

- **NSTabView.TabType**: These constants specify the tab view’s type as used by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTabView/tabViewType] property.
- **tabPosition**
- **NSTabView.TabPosition**
- **tabViewBorderType**
- **NSTabView.TabViewBorderType**
